Package jp.risu87.nbtio.nbt.tag

Class Tag

java.lang.Object
jp.risu87.nbtio.nbt.tag.Tag
Direct Known Subclasses:
ByteArrayTag, ByteTag, CompoundTag, DoubleTag, EndTag, FloatTag, IntArrayTag, IntTag, ListTag, LongArrayTag, LongTag, ShortTag, StringTag
public abstract class Tag
extends java.lang.Object
The super class of all known NBT tag types.
Author:
risusan87

    • getAllocatedByteSize

      @Deprecated public final int getAllocatedByteSize()
      Deprecated.
      Returns byte size of this whole tag allocated. DEPRECATED: NEVER use this method anymore. DO USE getSizelessAllocatedByteSize() or getCorrespondedAllocatedByteSize instead.
      Returns:
      byte size
